patterns: What scholarship opportunities are there?
How can I accept financial aid?
How can I calculate my loan fees?
Are there any tuition-free opportunities available through Rowan?
I want deadlines to apply for scholarships
Can I have the deadline for financial aid?
responses: For information on scholarshgip opportunities, financial aid, tuition fees, and frequently asked questions, visit: https://sites.rowan.edu/financial-aid/

patterns: Are admissions easy?
What is the acceptance process like for Rowan?
When do I need to submit my application?
How do I apply?
When can my child apply to be accepted to Rowan?
Are there any application fees?
When are admissions due?
responses: The Rowan Admissions site offers concise and useful information for any undergraduates or graduates looking to apply to become a Rowan student. Please visit: https://admissions.rowan.edu/

patterns: Are there police on campus?
I wanna know about public safety on campus.
Will my child be safe on campus?
Is security at Rowan any good?
responses: Rowan offers a comprehensive public safety program for the university community. We provide numerous services through the following sections: Police, Security, Parking, Dispatch Center, Crime Prevention and the Office of Emergency Management. We focus on preventive patrols, crime prevention programming, and the physical establishment of Crime Prevention Through Environmental Design standards throughout our campuses. Find out more here: https://sites.rowan.edu/publicsafety/

patterns: What are the contacts for public safety?
I need to contact the dispatch center
Can I get in contact with camden security?
I need to call about parking
Can I reach out to a crime tip hotline?
I feel as if I'm in danger on campus
I do not feel safe on campus
responses: List of contacts for Public Safety can be found here, including options for hearing impaired students: https://sites.rowan.edu/publicsafety/contactus.html

patterns: Does Rowan offer Gender Inclusive Housing?
What housing does Rowan provide for LGBTQ students?
Is there housing for gender non comforming people?
Does Rowan offer queer inclusive housing?
responses: Yes, Rowan offers Gender-Inclusive Housing as an option to provide the greatest flexibility to our resident students and assure an environment that is welcoming, inclusive, and supportive of all students. Gender Inclusive Housing allows students to choose roommates and share bedrooms, suites, or apartments without restrictions based on gender or sex. The purpose of this policy is to create a campus climate that prioritizes diversity, equity, and belonging. To learn more, visit: https://sites.rowan.edu/housing/housing-options/gender-inclusive-housing.html

patterns: What options are there for campus housing?
How many residence halls are there?
Does Rowan offer apartments for housing?
What are housing rates like?
Can I do laundry on campus?
responses: Boasting 7 residence halls, 4 apartment complexes, as well as offering affiliated housing with Nexus properties, Living Learning Communities, and Gender Inclusive housing opportunities, Rowan offers many different options for housing on campus. To learn more about your options for housing as well as services provided, please visit: https://sites.rowan.edu/housing/

patterns: Is Rowan an inclusive school?
How diverse can I expect Rowan university to be?
Is Rowan accessible for students with accomodations?
Can I expect my needs to be met when attending?
responses: Rowan University aims to be a model for higher education by being inclusive, agile, and responsive, offering diverse scholarly and creative educational experiences, pathways, environments, and services to meet the needs of all students; maintaining agility by strategically delivering organizational capacity across the institution; and responding to emerging demands and opportunities regionally and nationally.

patterns: Hi
Hey
Are you there?
Is anyone there?
Hello
Howdy
responses: Hey there!
Hello! I am here and happy to help.
Heyo! Happy to see you. I'm ready to help whenever you'd like.
Hello! How can I help you?

patterns: Bye
Seeya
Thanks for the help
Goodbye
I am done for now
responses: Thank you for stopping by!
Goodbye! Have a good rest of your day.
See you some other time, and good luck!

patterns: What is Rowan?
What does Rowan offer?
What can I expect out of Rowan?
Can you tell me about Rowan?
Tell me about Rowan.
responses: Founded in 1923, Rowan University is a public research instituion offering bachelor and doctoral degrees, certifications, and inclusive learning to over 20,000 students in New Jersey. For a more extensive answer, please visit: https://www.rowan.edu/about/

patterns: Say something funny
Tell me a joke
Can you make me laugh?
Can you tell a joke?
responses: I don't want to. Sorry!
What do you call a cow with no legs? Ground beef! :D
What has 2 eyes and 2 ears? Not me. I am not human. I am in your computer! :D

patterns: Do you have a name?
Tell me your name
What do I call you?
What is your name?
responses: My name is Rolland! Thank you for asking.
I am Rolland! How kind of you to ask.
